entities.name: room

entities.name: Harry

entities.name: Ginny

entities.name: Dean Thomas

entities.name: Romilda Vane

entities.name: Hermione

entities.name: Ron
entities.description: Ron is introduced still clutching the Cup and wearing an expression appropriate to having been clubbed over the head, indicating he's been injured or affected by some kind of incident.

relationships.description: Harry looked over Ginny's head to see what was happening, indicating he's actively engaged in the scene and aware of her presence.
Harry saw Dean Thomas holding a shattered glass in his hand, showing he's aware of what's happening to him.
Harry saw Romilda Vane looking like she might throw something, indicating he's aware of her emotional state.
Harry saw Hermione beaming, showing he's aware of her happy or pleased expression.
Harry looked at Ron, who was still clutching the Cup and wearing an expression appropriate to having been clubbed over the head, indicating they have a connection or relationship.
Ron looked at Harry for a fraction of a second before giving him a tiny jerk of the head, indicating they have a connection or relationship.
